original_text: King Ahab brought together the Israelite army and he gave them food and weapons. Then they marched out to fight against the Syrian army. The Israelite soldiers stood there in two groups. They looked like two small groups of goats! The Syrian soldiers were so many that they covered all the land around.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손도 소집되어 군량을 받고 마주 나가서 그들 앞에 진영을 치니 이스라엘 자손은 두 무리의 적은 염소 떼와 같고 아람 사람은 그 땅에 가득하였더라

sentences.original_text: King Ahab brought together the Israelite army
and he gave them food and weapons
Then they marched out to fight
They looked like two small groups of goats
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 작은 염소 두 무리처럼 보였습니다

sentences.original_text: The Syrian soldiers were so many
that they covered all the land around
